page.title: 12Shops in Stone
page.content: Many shops in Stone are in the High Street.If you wanted to get food you would probably go to International which is a supermarket, but there are other food shops like Bengry's which is a baker's.There are other bakers called Taylor's and Mr.George's.There are a few butchers. They are called W.Jervis, Dewhurst's and Tony's Family Butchers.There are several shoe shops which are called Lotus, Oliver's, Astbury's and Sello Pere.You can buy clothes at Ethel Austin's, Woolworth's and Just Seconds.Geoff Hall's is a barber's. There is also one wool shop called Wendy.If you wanted to get some gardening things you would probably go to Norman Rhead's. Stonefield Cycles in Albert Street sell and repair cycles.New and secondhand books are sold at the Old Fire Station Bookshop.
